data.name: Explainable AI (XAI) - The Practitioners' View
data.summary: Latest research developments unlocking new potential for XAI and to learn about the exciting initiatives where this potential is being realised in industry.
data.speakers:
Dr. Nicolas Chapados, Co-Founder and Chief Science Officer, Element AI
 Dr. David Hardoon, Senior Advisor for Data and Artificial Intelligence, UnionBank Philippines

Moderator: Charles Ross, Asia Editorial Director, The Economist Intelligence Unit
